content: 3rd chain of starting 4ch break yarn and join new colour to corner space keep working more rounds as given for round 4 changing colour at the end of each round until you have worked a total of 68 rounds or you have a size you are happy with border join the border colour to corner space round 1 1ch * 1sc 2ch 1sc in corner space 3ch 1sc in next space 3ch along side to next corner * repeat from * to * around the blanket edge to the start space slip_stitch into top of 1st single_crochet of round round 2 slip_stitch to corner space 1ch *3sc in corner space 1sc in single_crochet 3sc in chain space 1sc in single_crochet along side to next corner * repeat from * to * around the blanket edge to the start space slip_stitch into top of 1st single_crochet of round ✽ also see useful pictures on page 6 for help with the next round round 3 slip_stitch to next single_crochet middle of 3 corner single_crochet s 4ch counts as 1dc 1ch 1dc 1ch twice in same st **skip 1 1sc in next *1ch skip 3 1dc 1ch 3 times in next skip 3 1sc in next * repeat from * to * along the side of the blanket up to 3 corner single_crochet s skip 1 1dc 1ch 3 times in middle st of 3 corner single_crochet s ** repeat from ** to ** around blanket edge to starting corner then skip 1 slip_stitch into 3rd chain of starting 4ch round 4 slip_stitch into space 4ch counts as 1dc 1ch 1dc in same space 1dc in double_crochet 1dc 1ch 1dc in next space *1ch skip double_crochet and space 1sc in single_crochet 1ch skip chain and double_crochet 1dc 1ch 1dc in space 1dc in double_crochet 1dc 1ch 1dc in space * repeat from * to * around blanket edge until last single_crochet has been worked then 1ch skip space and double_crochet slip_stitch into 3rd chain of starting 4ch break yarn a sandra paul/cherry heart
